xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.7 Hetuduka, Pītittika » 1.7.2 Sukhasahagatapada » 1.7.2.7 Pañhāvāra » Paccayacatukka
Hetvādi
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Pītittika
Sukhasahagatapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccayacatukka
Hetvādi
246.
488Hetu sukhasahagato dhammo hetussa sukhasahagatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi.
489Hetu sukhasahagato dhammo hetussa sukhasahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  nava.
490Hetu sukhasahagato dhammo hetussa sukhasahagatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo…  nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
247.
491Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre tīṇi, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge nava, sampayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
<< Paccayacatukkaup Paccanīyuddhāra >>
